content: create a vibrant halloween crochet bag inspired by sally s dress from nightmare before christmas with this ad-free large-print pdf pattern this easy-level pattern uses basic stitches single half double double and treble_crochet to craft a 12x12 patchwork bag includes detailed instructions diagrams and optional fabric lining tips perfect for scrap yarn and crocheters of all levels materials caron simply soft party yarn medium weight sample in fuchsia caron simply soft yarn medium weight sample in black loops & threads eco-brights yarn medium weight sample in yellow patons glam stripes yarn light weight sample in teal held double 4 mm g-6 crochet hook ½ yard fabric for optional lining sewing needle and thread for optional lining
